an6.96:4.1: “Mendicants, the appearance of six things is rare in the world.
an6.96:4.3: A Realized One, a Perfect One, a fully awakened Buddha. A person who teaches the teaching and training announced by a Realized One. Rebirth in a civilized region. Unimpaired sense faculties. Not being dull and stupid. Enthusiasm for wholesome qualities.
an6.96:4.4: The appearance of these six things is rare in the world.”
